snippet: The New York Public Library's cost projections have been one focus of the debate over the project, with critics calling for more financial detail beyond the current estimate of $300 million.
abstract: The New York Public Library's cost projections have been one focus of the debate over the project, with critics calling for more financial detail beyond the current estimate of $300 million.

headline.main: Library Chairman: Renovation Budget Still A Work in Progress
headline.print_headline: New York Public Library Chairman Says Renovation Budget Is Work in Progress
